Prepare orthogonal matrix

Source: R/prepare_orthogonal_matrix.R
prepare_orthogonal_matrix.Rd

Calculate orthogonal matrix U_Gamma for decomposition in Theorem 1. To calculate it, we use Theorem 6.

Usage

prepare_orthogonal_matrix(perm, perm_size = NULL, basis = NULL)

Arguments

perm

gips_perm or permutations::cycle object

perm_size

size of permutation. Required if perm is of permutations::cycle class

basis

matrix with basis vectors in COLUMNS. Identity by default

Value

matrix p x p with columns from V object elements, sorted according to Theorem 6.

Examples

gperm <- gips_perm("(1,2,3)(4,5)", 6)
U_g <- prepare_orthogonal_matrix(gperm)
